00023 #include "birdseed-dev/IntensitiesParser.h"
00024 //
00025 #include "broadutil/BroadException.h"
00026 #include "broadutil/BroadUtil.h"
00027 #include "broadutil/FileUtil.h"
00028 //
00029 #include <cerrno>
00030 #include <cstdio>
00031 
00032 using namespace std;
00033 using namespace birdseed::dev;
00034 
00035 IntensitiesParser::~IntensitiesParser()
00036 {
00037     if (fp != NULL) {
00038         fclose(fp);
00039     }
00040 }
00041 
00042 IntensitiesParser::IntensitiesParser(const std::string& path, bool calculateCorrectionFactor):
00043     dataPath(path),
00044     fp(fopen(path.c_str(), "r")),
00045     correctionFactor(0.0),
00046     header(),
00047     snpName(),
00048     intensities()
00049 {
00050     if (fp == NULL) {
00051       throw BroadException("Could not open file", __FILE__, __LINE__, path.c_str(), errno);
00052     }
00053     header = readHeader(fp, "probeset_id\t");
00054     if (calculateCorrectionFactor) {
00055         long dataStartOffset = ftell(fp);
00056         if (dataStartOffset == -1) {
00057           throw BroadException("ftell error", __FILE__, __LINE__, path.c_str(), errno);
00058         }
00059         double total = 0.0;
00060         size_t numIntensities = 0;
00061         while (true) {
00062             // Skip over SNP name
00063             snpName = readWord(fp);
00064             if (snpName.empty()) {
00065                 break;
00066             }
00067             double val;
00068             while (readDouble(fp, &val)) {
00069                 total += val;
00070                 ++numIntensities;
00071             }
00072         }
00073         correctionFactor = total/numIntensities;
00074 
00075         if (fseek(fp, dataStartOffset, SEEK_SET) == -1) {
00076           throw BroadException("fseek error", __FILE__, __LINE__, path.c_str(), errno);
00077         }
00078     }
00079 }
00080 
00081 bool IntensitiesParser::advanceSNP()
00082 {
00083     // Skip over first SNP name
00084     string snpNameA = readWord(fp);
00085     if (snpNameA.empty()) {
00086         snpName = "";
00087         intensities.reset(NULL);
00088         return false;
00089     }
00090     if (!endswith(snpNameA.c_str(), "-A")) {
00091         std::stringstream strm;
00092         strm << "Did not find -A suffix for SNP name: " << snpNameA << ".";
00093         throw BroadException(strm.str().c_str(), __FILE__, __LINE__, dataPath.c_str());
00094     }
00095     snpName = snpNameA.substr(0, snpNameA.size() - 2);
00096     
00097     vector<double> aValues;
00098     double val;
00099     while (readDouble(fp, &val)) {
00100         aValues.push_back(val);
00101     }
00102 
00103     // Skip over next SNP name
00104     string snpNameB = readWord(fp);
00105     if (!endswith(snpNameB.c_str(), "-B")) {
00106         std::stringstream strm;
00107         strm << "Did not find -B suffix for SNP name: " << snpNameB << ".";
00108         throw BroadException(strm.str().c_str(), __FILE__, __LINE__, dataPath.c_str());
00109     }
00110     if (snpName != snpNameB.substr(0, snpNameB.size() - 2)) {
00111         std::stringstream strm;
00112         strm << "B intensities do not have same SNP name as A.  SNP-A: " << snpNameA << "; SNP-B: " << snpNameB << " .";
00113         throw BroadException(strm.str().c_str(), __FILE__, __LINE__, dataPath.c_str());
00114     }
00115         
00116     intensities.reset(new IntensityMatrix(aValues.size()));
00117 
00118     // Syntactic sugar
00119     IntensityMatrix &intensitiesRef = *(intensities.get());
00120     
00121     for (size_t i = 0; i < aValues.size(); ++i) {
00122         intensitiesRef[i][0] = aValues[i];
00123         if (!readDouble(fp, &val)) {
00124             throw BroadException("Number of B values is less than number of A values", __FILE__, __LINE__, dataPath.c_str());
00125         }
00126         intensitiesRef[i][1] = val;
00127     }
00128     return true;
00129 }
